Articles.Content:
Here is my Kerbal Space Program Video(s) and Music track(s) I produced. Because I really like this game and see that it's going to be awesome in it's complete form. I decided to put together some material I hope the community enjoys.

I'm going to organize this from top newest to bottom oldest. And I'll keep 4 and start dropping the others.

[Music] http://soundcloud.com/mwaddle/sets/game-music-39

A Kerbal Space Program Kerban Exploration Ep 10

<iframe width="640" height="360" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/5da9vfPnGvM?feature=player_detailpage" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>

<iframe width="640" height="360" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/7cdQpppLzAw?feature=player_detailpage" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>

<iframe width="640" height="360" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/4DyLsfRtCik?feature=player_detailpage" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>

A Kerbal Space Program Gameplay Trailer

<iframe width="640" height="360" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/T-DrSFrmJsg?feature=player_detailpage" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>

Edited September 6, 2012 by OperationDx
Update
Great video as always man Just got done recording my second video!

Great video as always man Just got done recording my second video!

Ha Thanks... I watched your video and that's a cool ship you made. Keep up the good work
Thanks fellow michiganian Hope to see your content soon!

Here is another track I just finished producing for the awesome Kerbal Space Program.

Hope you guys like it.

http://soundcloud.com/mwaddle/ksp-mission-success

And yet another video for you guys.

<iframe width="640" height="360" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/H_Rwi_jH3Nk?feature=player_detailpage" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>

<iframe width="640" height="360" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/C28Mh22Fw4E?feature=player_detailpage" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>
Which program do you use to create your music?

Which program do you use to create your music?

I use a lot of different DAW's Like cubase and Flstudio. But for these tracks I used my Motif Xf6 and tracked them out in cubase to add some slight reverb effects
